summary: This bill, the Reclaim Trade Powers Act (H.R. 2459), aims to amend the Trade Act of 1974.  Specifically, it seeks to eliminate the authority to impose import surcharges used to address balance of payments deficits. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on March 27, 2025, by Mr. Panetta and others, was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means. The short title of the act is the Reclaim Trade Powers Act.
